name: Forest Seal Stone
effect: The Pokémon V this card is attached to can use the VSTAR Power on this card.
author: AYUMI ODASHIMA

vstar_power.name: Star Alchemy
vstar_power.effect: During your turn, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)
